ruling: - If [[Reckless Greed]] is activated, causing you to skip your next 2 Draw phases, and you also must skip your Draw Phase due to another effect such as [[Offerings to the Doomed]], the skipped Phases do not accumulate. So if you activate [[Reckless Greed]] and [[Offerings to the Doomed]], you only skip 2 Draw Phases.
- Skipping a Draw Phase is an effect, not a cost, so if [[Reckless Greed]] is negated you do not skip your Draw Phases.
